alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 1:16PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradley, southeastern Cleveland, eastern Calhoun, northwestern Drew and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 200 PM CST... At 114 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hampton to near Hampton Municipal Airport to 6 miles northeast of Calion to near Lawson. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren... Hampton... Hermitage... Wilmar... Harrell... Ingalls... Ellisville... Hilo... Hampton Municipal Airport... Hebron... Moro Bay... Weeks... Brandon... Mt Elba... Moro Bay State Park... Tipton... Marks Mill State Park... Lanark... Herbine... Banks... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.
